io.github.squid233.squidcraft.api

类 Registers

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.squid233.squidcraft.api.Registers

  • public class Registers
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the new API!!!

    You can copy these code.

    To see more information, please look at the old API: ItemsRegister

    从以下版本开始:
    0.4.6

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static net.minecraft.block.Block register(java.lang.String modid, java.lang.String name, net.minecraft.block.Block block, net.minecraft.item.Item.Settings settings)
      The register method You can use this method just like this below: public static final Block EXAMPLE_BLOCK = register("modid", "example", new Block(new Block.Settings()), new Item.Settings()); After register, log4j will be remind you: "register modid:example success!"
      static net.minecraft.item.Item register(java.lang.String modid, java.lang.String name, net.minecraft.item.Item item)
      See Registers The register method You can use this method just like this below: public static final Item EXAMPLE_ITEM = register("modid", "example", new Item(new Item.Settings()); After register, log4j will be remind you: "register modid:example success!"

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Registers

        public Registers()

    • 方法详细资料

      • register

        public static net.minecraft.item.Item register(java.lang.String modid,
                                               java.lang.String name,
                                               net.minecraft.item.Item item)
        See Registers

        The register method

        You can use this method just like this below:

        public static final Item EXAMPLE_ITEM = register("modid", "example", new Item(new Item.Settings());

        After register, log4j will be remind you: "register modid:example success!"

        参数:
        modid - Mod identifier.
        name - Item registry name.
        item - Item.
        返回:
        Registry item.

      • register

        public static net.minecraft.block.Block register(java.lang.String modid,
                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                 net.minecraft.block.Block block,
                                                 net.minecraft.item.Item.Settings settings)

        The register method

        You can use this method just like this below:

        public static final Block EXAMPLE_BLOCK = register("modid", "example", new Block(new Block.Settings()), new Item.Settings());

        After register, log4j will be remind you:

        "register modid:example success!"
        "register modid:example block success!"
        参数:
        modid - Mod identifier.
        name - Block registry name.
        block - Block.
        settings - Block item settings.
        返回:
        Registry block.
